DESCRIPTION.P: This block can realize any type of block. The computational function must already be defined in Scilab, Fortran or C code.

ITEM.label: simulation function
ITEM.SP: : a character string, the name of the computational function

ITEM.label: function type
ITEM.SP: : a non negative integer, the type of the computational function

ITEM.label: input port sizes
ITEM.SP: : a vector of integers, size of regular input ports.

ITEM.label: output port sizes
ITEM.SP: : a vector of integers, size of regular output ports.

ITEM.label: input event port sizes
ITEM.SP: : a vector of ones, size of event input ports. The size of the vector gives the number of event input ports.

ITEM.label: output event port sizes
ITEM.SP: : a vector of ones, size of event output ports. The size of the vector gives the number of of event output ports.

ITEM.label: System type
ITEM.SP: : a string: c,d, z or l (CBB, DBB, zero crossing or synchro).

ITEM.label: Real parameter vector
ITEM.SP: : column vector. Any parameters used in the block can be defined here as a column vector.

ITEM.label: Integer parameter vector
ITEM.SP: : column vector. Any integer parameters used in the block can be defined here as a column vector.

ITEM.label: initial firing
ITEM.SP: : vector. Size of this vector corresponds to the number of event outputs. The value of the i-th entry specifies the time of the preprogrammed event firing on the i-th output event port. If less than zero, no event is preprogrammed.

ITEM.label: direct feedthrough
ITEM.SP: : character "y" or "n", specifies if block has a direct input to output feedthrough.

ITEM.label: Time dependance
ITEM.SP: : character "y" or "n", specifies if block output depends explicitly on time.
